txt.en: More cages, supplies, and a dead end
The scout Laugi needs assistance completing his survey of the nearby enemy camp.
'Ah, you return! Laugi told me you were checking into the camp for us. My thanks. What have you found?'
Gunvald is in Annâk-khurfu in Elderslade.\n\nYou have enough information to make a report to Gunvald.
An army would be spotted from far off by anyone in this watch-tower
Scout the east portion of the camp
Zarkul-sulûn is in southern Elderslade.\n\nLaugi has asked you to scout Zarkul-sulûn.
Scout the southern section of the camp

'If Gunvald sent you, then he must trust you. I must return to our base and get this scratch tended to or my wife will never let me hear the end of it.\n\n'I was on my way to scout the camp ahead when I was beset upon by the enemy. Will you go scout ahead and report your findings to Gunvald?'
Numerous foul smelling cages and siege structures
Examine the back of the camp
